pages.text: 53|45|haey pitabrakd nasa  trong ban bangkeut aoy mean kou mean  brosa ning srei  nhi ning chhmol .
53|46|ampi tukkeam nowpel del trauv ke banh chaul tow knong sbaun .
53|47|haey pitabrakd nasa  kar bangkeut sachathmei mdongtiet kuchea  katapvokechch robsa trong .
53|48|haey pitabrakd nasa  trong chea anak thveu aoy mean  ning thveu aoy  krobkrean .
53|49|haey pitabrakd nasa  trong chea mcheasa krobkrong phkay  shie k r .
53|50|haey pitabrakd nasa  trong ban bamphlanh krom a d mounke .
53|51|ning krom sa mou d .  haey trong minban bansaoltouk anaknea  mneak laey .
53|52|haey( trong ban bamphlanh) krom nuo h kalpimoun . pitabrakd nasa  puokke kuchea puok del thleab ban bampean  ning rungrousa bamphot .
53|53|ning phoumi mou ta hvei kasa( phoumi robsa krom robsa lout) del trong  ban bamphlanh( thveu aoy kraleab pi leu chohkraom) .
53|54|haey trong ban krobadandab phoumi noh nouv avei( tearounakamm ampi  thm phleung) del ban krobadandab .
53|55|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat nei mcheasa  robsa anak namuoy del anak  now sangsay noh
53|56|nih( mou ham meat) kuchea anak dasatuen promean mneak knong  chamnaom anak dasatuen promean moun  .
53|57|thngai barlok khet kante chit haey .
53|58|kmean anaknea doengpi vea krawpi a l laoh laey .
53|59|dau che  neah  tae puok anak nguengochhngal champoh peakyasaamdei( kompir kuor an)  nih ryy
53|60|haey puok anak neaknea saechchamak( champoh kompir kuor an) haey  puok anak min yom( daoy karphyokhlach tearounakamm del ban riebreab now  knong vea) te ryy
53|61|khn del puok anak prongeuy k ndeu y ngeak chenh( pi kompir  kuor an) noh
53|62|dau che  neah  chaur puok anak saou chout  ning korp sakkar champoh  a l laoh choh .
54|1|kalkamnt nei thngai barlok chit mokadl  haey preah chnt ka  ban bek chea pir der  .
54|2|te tohbeicha puokke bankheunh mou chi hsaa t kadaoy  ka puokke  nowte ngeak chenh  haey niyeay tha  nih kuchea m nd akm da chbasa  leasa der  .
54|3|haey puokke themtang ban bdeseth  ning thveuteamchamnng robsa  puokke tiet phng .  haey real kechchakar teangoasa ku mean karkamnt .

54|4|haey chea karpit nasa  damnoeng muoychamnuon( robsa puok chomnean  moun) ban mokadl puokke( puok mou sh ri ki n) del nowknong noh meankar  hamkhat krobkrean( pi pheap kmean chomnue robsa puokke) .
54|5|kompir kuor an kuchea ktebandet da krobkrean( knong kardasatuen  promean)  te kardasatuen promean teangnoh min phdal phalobrayoch  avei( dl puokke) laey .

54|6|dau che  neah  chaur anak( mou ham meat) ber chenhpi puokke . ( chaur changcha)  now thngai del mea la ai kat srekhaw( puokke) aoy towkean kanleng  chomnoumchomreah del chea hetokar muoy da ronthot .
